title: Grade 12 Mathematics Mock Exam 2
subject: Mathematics
description: A 10-question Grade 12 Mathematics mock exam based on the Zambian syllabus. Includes detailed explanations to strengthen conceptual understanding. No open-ended questions included.

questions.question: This is a **mock Grade 12 Mathematics exam**. You will be tested on topics such as algebra, trigonometry, calculus, probability, and coordinate geometry. Read each question carefully and choose the correct answer.
Simplify: (3x^2 - 12) \div (x - 2)
questions.explanation: Factor the numerator: 3x^2 - 12 = 3(x^2 - 4) = 3(x - 2)(x + 2). Then divide by x - 2. Result: 3(x + 2) = 3x + 6.

questions.question: Find the value of \theta if \sin(\theta) = 3/5 and \theta is acute.
Find the roots of the equation: x^2 - 6x + 9 = 0
questions.explanation: x^2 - 6x + 9 = (x - 3)^2, so repeated root at x = 3.

questions.question: Calculate the volume of a cylinder with radius 3 cm and height 5 cm (Use \pi = 3.14)
If P(A) = 0.6 and P(B) = 0.3, and A and B are independent, what is P(A ∩ B)?
questions.explanation: If A and B are independent, then P(A ∩ B) = P(A) * P(B) = 0.6 * 0.3 = 0.18.

questions.question: Find the gradient of the line: y = 4x - 7
questions.explanation: The gradient is the coefficient of x, which is 4.

questions.question: What is the next term in the sequence: 2, 6, 12, 20, ... ?
questions.explanation: The pattern increases by +4, +6, +8,... So next difference is +10: 20 + 10 = 30.
